input_text: Enter a text below and click the button corresponding to your choice
error_input_txt: The text provided could not be {value}!
license_txt: The source code of this application is under MIT License, everything else must be considered registered content of their respective owners and developers.
keyword_tooltip: The password is used as a key to encrypt/decrypt text. By default, the application uses a standard password. If you want to use a custom password, it must be 20 characters long. Note: Spaces are not allowed
keyword_warning: Without the exact keyword it is not possible to unscramble text that has been scrambled before!
translators_name: Joel de Lima | Thiago Lima de Sousa
error_open_site: An error occurred and the site could not be opened:
